author: samcm
content:
https://ethpandaops.io/posts/fusaka-devnet-5-bpo-analysis/

I've run some analysis on `fusaka-devnet-5` in an attempt to give us _some_ clarity on blob values. This network had a LOT of turbulence, and only really stabilized ~18hours ago (and even still some clients were filtered out). 

As a result we don't have much data to work with before todays ACD so the results here should be taken with a grain of salt. But imo its still insightful ðŸ™‚

author: ralexstokes
content:
